What are the treatments for glycine encephalopathy ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of glycine encephalopathy:  - Baby's First Test  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Glycine Encephalopathy  - Genetic Testing Registry: Non-ketotic hypergly
